description: This requirement is for Correctional Training Program (CTP) Meal Services. The value of the purchase is \\$
full_summary:
### Correctional Training Program (CTP) Meal Services Tender Announcement

### Summary

The Correctional Service Canada (CSC) is seeking a contractor to provide meal services for the Correctional Training Program (CTP) in the Pacific Region. The successful bidder will be responsible for providing individual lunch and dinner meals, as well as a group dinner, for up to four (4) CTP groups.

### Key Details

* **Contract Reference Number:** 21802-23-0056
* **Tender Closing Date:** October 20, 2023, 17:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** November 6, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date:** May 29, 2025
* **Location:** Abbotsford, British Columbia (with the possibility of occasional deliveries to external locations)
* **Cuisine:** Packaged combination meals (UNSPSC 50192700)

### Meal Services Requirements

* **Individual Meals:** Provide individual lunch and dinner meals for up to four (4) CTP groups.
* **Group Dinner:** Provide a group dinner for up to twenty-four (24) recruits per CTP group.
* **Special Dietary Needs:** Accommodate special dietary needs and allergies.

### Service Requirements

* **Delivery Schedules:** Deliver meals according to a scheduled delivery schedule, which includes:
	+ Lunch: Monday to Friday (excluding statutory holidays)
	+ Dinner: Sunday to Saturday and statutory holidays
* **Menu Variety:** Provide a varied and nutritious meal menu that meets Canada Food Guide standards.
* **Customer Service:** Respond promptly to customer complaints and concerns.

### Evaluation Criteria

The successful bidder will be evaluated based on the lowest priced compliant bid.

### Important Documents

* **Request for Proposal (RFP) Document:** Available on the Canada Buys website (https://canadabuys.canada.ca)
* **Solicitation Document:** Available on the Canada Buys website (https://canadabuys.canada.ca)

### Contact Information

* **Contracting Authority:** Amber Hupper
* **Phone:** (236) 380-1379
* **Email:** [amber.hupper@csc-scc.gc.ca](mailto:amber.hupper@csc-scc.gc.ca)
* **Address:** #100, 33991 Gladys Avenue, Abbotsford, BC V2S 2E8
